text: Ware ga kuruan o gaikoku-go de kudashitanaraba, kare-ra wa kitto,`kono shirushi wa, doshite hakkiri nobe rarenai nodeshou. Nanto, Arabia hito (no shito) ni gaikoku-go (no keiji)na nodesu ka.' To iu. Itte yaru ga i. `Sore wa shinko suru mono ni totte wa michibikideari, chiryodearu.Daga shinjinai mono wa, sono mimi ga nibuku nari, mata sore ga (wakarazu) momokudearu. Kare-ra wa, toi tokoro kara yobikake rareru (yona mo) nodearu
